data.title: Configurator
data.description: Configurator is an angular service where you can set/get all options or configs as a root (singleton) for all your app.

data.title: Support
data.description: Support is a collection of common functions to help you and continues grow, also it is used on other ng-lab packages as a dependency.

data.title: JWT
data.description: JWT is an angular service to help you on decode valid token and also checking expiration to provide renovation mecanism.

data.title: Responsive
data.description: Responsive is an angular directive to define media breakpoints, listen for changes and trigger event when resize happens on the page.

data.title: Hub
data.description: Hub is an angular service pub/sub where you can register channels and dispatch/listen custom events.

data.title: Http-Script
data.description: Http-Script is an angular service to register and load external javascript libraries.

data.title: Http-Url
data.description: Http-Url is an angular service to define urls and resolve them with or without parameters.

data.title: Layout
data.description: Component to create flex container elements. Usefull for layout areas and many stuff (boxes, containers etc...)
